metadataAttributes.Title: Digital Marketing Strategy and Planning Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Drive Digital Marketing Strategy. Place digital strategy at the heart of your business and learn all the core skills required to think, lead, and execute in a digital world.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Digital transformation, Digital Marketing, Content Marketing, Digital Strategy, Digital Research, Search Engine Marketing (SEM) Strategy, Display and Video Advertising Strategy, Social Media and Email Marketing Strategy, E-Commerce Strategy, Digital Channel Planning, Strategic Thinking, Strategy Execution,
